prompt: <description>Part 1 Instructions Shape Construct a three-dimensional, rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The front face is angled, creating a sense of depth. The object is centered and occupies the majority of the image. Coordinate System Create a new coordinate system for part 1 with the following parameters: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.075, 0.0] Sketch 1. **Face 1** Begin by creating a new 2D sketch on the XY plane defined by the coordinate system. 2. **Loop 1** Create a closed loop with the following curves: - Line 1: [0.0, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.0] - Line 2: [0.75, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.1875] - Line 3: [0.75, 0.1875] to [0.6, 0.3375] - Line 4: [0.6, 0.3375] to [0.375, 0.3375] - Line 5: [0.375, 0.3375] to [0.375, 0.1875] - Line 6: [0.375, 0.1875] to [0.225, 0.1875] - Line 7: [0.225, 0.1875] to [0.225, 0.3375] - Line 8: [0.225, 0.3375] to [0.075, 0.3375] - Line 9: [0.075, 0.3375] to [0.0, 0.2625] - Line 10: [0.0, 0.2625] to [0.0, 0.0] Extrusion Extrude the sketch along the normal direction with the following properties: - Extrude depth toward normal: 0.075 - Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0 - Sketch scale: 0.75 - Operation: Create a new solid body The resulting object will be the first intermediate part in the assembly with a length of 0.75, a width of 0.075, and a height of 0.75.</description>

prompt: <description>Part 1: Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a single vertical slot in the center. The slot is slightly wider than the prism's height. The prism is centered on a vertical axis and is slightly tapered towards the top. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following parameters: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0192, 0.0] Create the first face of the prism as follows: - Sketch a rectangle with two lines: - Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.0] - Line 2: Start Point [0.75, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.1122] - Line 3: Start Point [0.75, 0.1122], End Point [0.0, 0.1122] - Line 4: Start Point [0.0, 0.1122], End Point [0.0, 0.0] Create the second face of the prism by sketching a circle as follows: - Circle 1: Center [0.375, 0.0801], Radius 0.0256 The second face should be scaled by 0.75x and extruded by 0.0192 towards the normal and 0 towards the opposite normal. Part 2: Create a cylindrical object with a central hole. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following parameters: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.3494, 0.0192, 0.0545] Create the face of the cylindrical object as follows: - Sketch a circle with a center and a radius: - Circle 1: Center [0.0256, 0.0256], Radius 0.0256 The face should be scaled by 0.0513x, and have two extrusions: - Extrude 0.0032 towards the normal and 0 towards the opposite normal. The final shape of this CAD assembly is a long, rectangular, flat object with a slightly curved edge. The dimensions of the base are approximately 0.75 units in length, 0.02 units in width, and 0.12 units in height. The dimensions of the second part are approximately 0.05 units in length, 0.003 units in width, and 0.05 units in height.</description>
